5579.verse: وَظَنَّ|And he is certain|132|221|8098$أَنَّهُ|that it|62|240|267$ٱلْفِرَاقُ|(is) the parting.|125|214|17618$

5571.verse: No! But you love the immediate

5573.verse: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,

5575.verse: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,

5576.verse: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.

5577.verse: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones

5578.verse: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"

5579.verse: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation

5580.verse: And the leg is wound about the leg,

5581.verse: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.

5582.verse: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.

5583.verse: But [instead], he denied and turned away.

5584.verse: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].

5586.verse: Then woe to you, and woe!

5587.verse: Does man think that he will be left neglected?

5588.verse: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?

5589.verse: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]

5590.verse: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.

5591.verse: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?

5592.verse: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?

5593.verse: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

5594.verse: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

5595.verse: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.

5596.verse: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,
